msbt.message: Yo! I totally have something to tell you, but I can't remember what it is. So?
Heya! You need something?<10_4 /> Whatâ€”you looked like you needed something, !
Whoa! When I saw your face just now, I forgot all of my problems!I also developed an immediate and intense craving for a cold glass of . Weird!
Yo! I'm super glad to see you. You make it easy to forget about my crushing debts!
